name: Quicksand Simulator
description:
The world's finest realistic quicksand simulator.

A bunch of treasure fell from the Sky! But the bad news is, it landed in quicksand! Grab as much as you can before it all sinks. But be careful, if you move too much quicksand will QUICKly... crush you to death.

Built for Mini Jam 97 

https://minijamofficial.com/
